file.string: Password needs at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

You can add more accounts later from your profile. This sets your starting balance.

This app is designed for tracking your personal expenses only. We do not connect to your real bank accounts or access any of your banking data. All information you enter stays securely on your device.
